glsa.title: lighttpd: Denial of service
glsa.synopsis: A processing error in lighttpd might result in a Denial of Service condition.

background.p: lighttpd is a lightweight high-performance web server.

description.p: Li Ming reported that lighttpd does not properly process packets that are sent overly slow.

impact.p: A remote attacker might send specially crafted packets to a server running lighttpd, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition via host memory exhaustion.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All lighttpd users should upgrade to the latest version:
